metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3957 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability classified as problematic was found in GPAC. Affected bythis vulnerability is the function svg_parse_preserveaspectratio of thefile scenegraph/svg_attributes.c of the component SVG Parser. Themanipulation leads to memory leak. The attack can be launched remotely. Thename of the patch is 2191e66aa7df750e8ef01781b1930bea87b713bb. It isrecommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The associated identifierof this vulnerability is VDB-213463.

criterions.comment: gpac package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
